org.wickedsource.logunit.logback

Class LogUnitLogbackConsoleAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAwareBase
      • ch.qos.logback.core.UnsynchronizedAppenderBase<E>
        • ch.qos.logback.core.OutputStreamAppender<E>
          • ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>
            • org.wickedsource.logunit.logback.LogUnitLogbackConsoleAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ch.qos.logback.core.Appender<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>, ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAware, ch.qos.logback.core.spi.FilterAttachable<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>, ch.qos.logback.core.spi.LifeCycle

    public class LogUnitLogbackConsoleAppender
extends ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>
    A LogUnit-aware Logback ConsoleAppender. Configure Logback with this appender to allow LogUnit to listen on log events and thus to enable unit testing of log output.
    Author:
    hombergs
